Name: Bloody Bronx Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of dehydrated blood orange slice or orange zest twist.
Review: A Bronx made 'bloody' by the use of blood oranges. Fruity yet dry with botanical notes both from the vermouth and the gin.
Nutrition: One serving of Bloody Bronx Cocktail contains 158 calories
